name: Shadow realm invader
description:
shadow realm invader, it is a rework of the endless runner genre with some twists that can be adjusted in the options menu, collect enough shadow shards to enter the realm below the current realm.... the shadow realm (it is almost as same as the one above showing the as above so below theme) to collect light shards to purchase new maps and such 

Contents used that were created before the jam:

from UE marketplace: 

Lowpoly Style Asia Environment 

Vehicle Variety Pack

Niagara Mega VFX Pack vol. 1

From kitbash3d

neocity  kit

from weloveindies

all the audio
